_aLatestUpdates._sTitle: First map improvement & porting second map

_aChangeLog.text: Stripper updates: check cfg for the information

_sText:
Chartapilus's CSS ZE

I | II | III | IV | V


The Parish from Left 4 Dead 2 (5th campaign), ported and modified to become zombie escape map.
  • The map is currently only have the first chapter of the campaign, so the gameplay is less than 5 minutes.
  • Map has a randomize path that can go for the sake of replayability.
  • I will probably combine all the chapter into 1 map instead.
  • No unnecessary sounds/musics are added to this port, all sounds and ambient are using  from the original map in L4D2
m1 stand for "map 1" and v is version of the map

Possible challenge for this maps:
-TMP & pump Shotgun ONLY
-50% infect rate
